long_description: The Arc'teryx Atom LT jacket is ideal for ambitious days when the mercury plummets. This warm mid layer features composite materials that balance warmth and breathability. Warm and water-resistant woven nylon outer fabric extends stand-alone usability, and its 2-way stretch offers incredible comfort; Durable Water Repellent finish. Lightweight and compressible, the Atom LT features Coreloft(TM) synthetic insulation in the torso and arms. Polartec(R) Power Stretch(R) with Hardface(R) side panels and underarms increase range of motion and breathability. Front zipper features an insulated windflap. Gusseted underarms and articulated elbows ensure a good fit. Laminated hem drawcord and stretch knit wrist gaskets hold in warmth. Arc'teryx Atom LT jacket features handwarmer pockets and 1 internal pocket. Hip length with drop back hem; trim fit maximizes heat retention.
short_description: The Arc'teryx Atom LT jacket is ideal for ambitious days when the mercury plummets. This warm mid layer features composite materials that balance warmth and breathability.
